summary: The diff adds a client-side playthrough results hook with localStorage persistence and derives best-time and best-moves leaderboards. SolitairePage records exactly one result per won playthrough (guarded by a ref keyed to the game instance) and passes current time/moves plus both leaderboards into an updated WinDialog UI that displays the current result, two ranked lists, and empty states in English.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds a timestamp field to each stored playthrough result and uses it as a unique key in leaderboard rendering.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only requires recording elapsedSeconds and moves; timestamp is an additional stored/display-support field not explicitly requested.
